summary: Versatile writer with 8+ years of experience spanning journalism, creative fiction, and content marketing. Adept at capturing authentic voices and crafting compelling narratives that engage diverse audiences. Published author with a passion for storytelling that bridges cultural divides and illuminates human experiences.

jobs.title: Senior Content Strategist
jobs.description: Lead content strategy and creation for diverse clients across technology, healthcare, and education sectors.
achievements: Developed comprehensive content strategies that increased client organic traffic by an average of 78% within 6 months.
Created the company's signature 'Story-First SEO' methodology, balancing search optimization with compelling narrative approaches.
Managed a team of 7 writers, implementing a collaborative workshop process that improved content quality metrics by 42%.

jobs.title: Staff Writer
jobs.description: Produced in-depth feature articles and human interest stories for a regional publication with 150,000+ readers.
achievements: Authored a 5-part investigative series on urban housing inequality that won a Regional Press Award and led to policy changes.
Conducted over 200 interviews with subjects from diverse backgrounds, developing a reputation for empathetic and accurate representation.
Pioneered the publication's digital-first storytelling approach, increasing online readership by 63%.

promotions.title: Senior Staff Writer
achievements: Mentored junior writers and interns in journalistic practices and ethical reporting standards.
Led the development of the publication's style guide update, incorporating inclusive language practices.

jobs.title: Freelance Writer
jobs.description: Provided versatile writing services for publications, brands, and creative projects across multiple industries.
achievements: Published over 250 articles in outlets including HuffPost, Medium, and industry-specific journals.
Ghostwrote two non-fiction books that reached Amazon category bestseller status.
Developed content strategies for small businesses that doubled their engagement metrics.

education.description: Focus on narrative non-fiction and short story. Thesis collection 'Ordinary Wonders' received departmental honors. Teaching fellowship in undergraduate composition courses.
Minor in Journalism. Editor of college literary magazine. Thesis: 'Digital Narratives: How Technology is Reshaping Storytelling Conventions.'
